metadata.Title: CVE-2015-2172 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: DokuWiki before 2014-05-05d and before 2014-09-29c does not properly check permissions for the ACL plugins, which allows remote authenticated users to gain privileges and add or delete ACL rules via a request to the XMLRPC API.

notes.Note: tyhicks> Vulnerability is in XMLRPC API that is marked experimental and off by default

criterions.comment: dokuwiki: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
